if a specific balance decrease is allowed (i.e. doesn't bring the user borrow position health factor under 1e18)","params":{"_amount":"the amount to decrease","_reserve":"the address of the reserve","_user":"the address of the user"},"return":"true if the decrease of the balance is allowed*"},"calculateCollateralNeededInETH(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"the amount the user wants to borrow","_fee":"the fee for the amount that the user ltv of the user given his current collateral"},"return":"the total amount of collateral in ETH to cover the current borrow balance + the new amount + fee*"},"calculateUserGlobalData(address)":{"details":"calculates the user data across the reserves. this includes the total liquidity/collateral/borrow balances in ETH, the average Loan To Value, the average Liquidation Ratio, and the Health factor.","params":{"_user":"the address of the user"},"return":"the total liquidity, total collateral, total borrow balances of the user in ETH. also the average Ltv, liquidation threshold, and the health factor*"},"getHealthFactorLiquidationThreshold()":{"details":"returns the health factor liquidation balanceDecreaseAllowed(address,address,u.details: check if a specific balance decrease is allowed (i.e. doesn't bring the user borrow position health factor under 1e18)
balanceDecreaseAllowed(address,address,u.return: true if the decrease of the balance is allowed*

params._amount: the amount the user wants to borrow
params._fee: the fee for the amount that the user needs to cover
params._reserve: the reserve from which the user wants to borrow
params._userCurrentBorrowBalanceTH: the current borrow balance of the user (before the borrow)
params._userCurrentLtv: the average ltv of the user given his current collateral

calculateCollateralNeededInETH(address,u.return: the total amount of collateral in ETH to cover the current borrow balance + the new amount + fee*

calculateUserGlobalData(address).details: calculates the user data across the reserves. this includes the total liquidity/collateral/borrow balances in ETH, the average Loan To Value, the average Liquidation Ratio, and the Health factor.
calculateUserGlobalData(address).return: the total liquidity, total collateral, total borrow balances of the user in ETH. also the average Ltv, liquidation threshold, and the health factor*

getHealthFactorLiquidationThreshold().details: returns the health factor liquidation threshold*

getReserveConfigurationData(address).details: accessory functions to fetch data from the lendingPoolCore*

calculateCollateralNeededInETH(address,u.notice: calculates the amount of collateral needed in ETH to cover a new borrow.

userdoc.notice: Implements functions to fetch data from the core, and aggregate them in order to allow computation on the compounded balances and the account balances in ETH*
